title: Red Wine Pitcher, "Bohemian Baroque", 1868
provenance: The Hans Backhausen family, owners of a famous Viennese textile company, ordered and used this set.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Dale and Doug Anderson, Anonymous Donor, Arthur Liu, and Prairie Pictures, Inc. and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Mouth-blown crystal, elaborately facet-cut and polished

participants.person_name: J. & L. Lobmeyr GmbH, Vienna, Austria

tombstone.epitaph:
Red Wine Pitcher, "Bohemian Baroque", 1868.
1868. Glass. Museum purchase through gift of Dale and Doug Anderson, Anonymous Donor, Arthur Liu, and Prairie Pictures, Inc. and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 2009-18-37.
